description: The contract is for completion of the annual Northern Boundary Sockeye Run Reconstruction (NBRR),
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Northern Boundary Run Reconstruction Model 2023-2024

## Project Overview

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking bids for the Northern Boundary Run Reconstruction Model (NBRRM) 2023-2024. This project involves the completion of annual assessments of sockeye stock composition and escapement in the Northern Boundary Area.

## Project Background

The NBRRM has been conducted annually since the 1990s as part of the bilateral post-season Northern Boundary Technical Committee assessments. The program provides critical data for managing fishery resources in the region.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Reference Number**: cb-8126-88820318
* **Contract ID**: 30004668
* **Publication Date**: August 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 5, 2023, at 1:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time
* **Contract Start Date**: September 30, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Service Contract (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: British Columbia
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Tender Description

The successful contractor will be responsible for completing the annual NBRRM, which includes data collection and documentation services. The contractor will also be required to provide fishery information and documentation services.

## Selection Criteria

No selection criteria have been established for this procurement.

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contact Person**: Terri Jones
* **Contact Email**: [terri.jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:terri.jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (506) 461-3743
